dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for powersellernyc.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 27, 2006 9:18 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for powersellernyc.com

The Planet,

We have rechecked www.powerseller.com and they are still infringing on Onkyo's text.
Text is a description written about a product in order to support the sale of a
product. If you need any further assistance please contact me via email at
Bdavis@netenforcers.com.  Below I have pasted the remaining infringing URL's.


http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-14057--Onkyo-HT-S670S-5-1-CHANNEL-HOME-THEATER-SYSTEM-.html

http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-15078--ONKYO-TX-SR702-THX-SELECT-7-1-CHANNEL-HOME-THEATER-RECEIVER-.html

http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-16310--Onkyo-TX-SR603X-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html

http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-17997--Onkyo-SKS-HT240-Home-Theater-Speaker-System-.html

Thank you,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]
Sent: Tuesday, December 26, 2006 5:00 PM
To: Barbara Davis; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for powersellernyc.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your below-pasted
complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------



From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com]
Sent: Friday, December 15, 2006 2:45 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: [Fwd: FW: DMCA ISP Notification powersellernyc.com/Onkyo]

The Planet,

We have rechecked www.powerseller.com and they are still infringing on Onkyo's text.
Text is a description written about a product in order to support the sale of a
product. I have attached a PDF file with the infringing material circled in red and
I also attached a PDF of Onkyo's website showing that the text is the same. I am
also sending you all the infringing URL's. If you need any further assistance please
contact me via email at Bdavis@netenforcers.com.

http://powersellernyc.com/product-14045--Onkyo-TX-SR602-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-14057--Onkyo-HT-S670S-5-1-CHANNEL-HOME-THEATER-SYSTEM-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-15078--ONKYO-TX-SR702-THX-SELECT-7-1-CHANNEL-HOME-THEATER-RECEIVER-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-16310--Onkyo-TX-SR603X-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-16311--Onkyo-TX-SR703-THX-Select2-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-17997--Onkyo-SKS-HT240-Home-Theater-Speaker-System-.html



Thank you,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged.
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or
dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
